name: Lord of the Rings(moria)
description:
Me and my friends started a challenge to make a game with Lord of the rings theme we chose moria battle and we made a little recording game based on Aragorn fighting with orcs 

It may have some bugs, let me know if you found one ;)

You can also use characters that my friend made, for free

https://sketchfab.com/hamedphixer/collections/ez-characters-19941d39bfdc4f618cb6...
